scripts.pkg-copy: cp smol-core/package.json lib/smol-core && cp smol-express/package.json lib/smol-express
scripts.pkg-install: cd lib/smol-core && pnpm install && cd ../smol-express && pnpm install
scripts.start-example: cd api-example && pnpm install && concurrently "pnpm docker:start" "pnpm dev"
